snippet: David Pogue, technology reviewer for The New York Times, runs through the announcements coming out of Apple's developers' conference - laptops, Siri, iOS, Mountain Lion and more-and notes the significance of each one.
abstract: David Pogue, technology reviewer for The New York Times, runs through the announcements coming out of Apple's developers' conference - laptops, Siri, iOS, Mountain Lion and more-and notes the significance of each one.

headline.main: Pogue Parses the News From Apple
